name: KUTO Video Browser-Web video downloader & player
description: KUTO Video Browser is designed for web video browsing, you can easily find the video in the page and then play the video or just download it  Features:  * Pure & Tiny * Totally free * Support most of popular websites, such as facebook, twitter, instagram and so on * Powerful downloader and file manager, you can simply download or manage your video files * Powerful video player, supports most of popular formats, and you have serval gestures to control the playing. Moreover you can play the video on smart TV via DLAN * Less advertisement  Due to legal restrictions, videos on YouTube CANNOT be downloaded.
